name: Universal Heat Death Characteristic
desc: When characters are hit or consume their own HP, they gain 4 stack(s) of Fighting Spirit. When the turn ends, the character loses 4 stack(s) of Fighting Spirit.
enhanced_desc: When being hit or losing HP, the character gains 4 stacks of Fighting Spirit, and adjacent allies gain 1 stacks of Fighting Spirit. When the turn ends, the character loses 4 stacks of Fighting Spirit.
